text: John "Jack" Hilton (20 February 1925 - 26 May 2007) was an English professional footballer who played as a forward. He made three appearances in the English football League with Wrexham. He also played for Hyde United, where in the 1949–50 season, he scored 27 goals in 29 league games.{{cite web |title=Jack Hilton |url=http:// ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2007 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Hyde United F.C. players Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
